products.title: soda
products.description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans soaked in hot water, served hot and  can be  with a dash of milk, cream . And if you want to sound fancy, you can call black coffee by its proper name: café noir.

products.title: Latte
products.description: As the most popular coffee drink out there, the latte consists of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam. It can be ordered unflavored or flavored with everything. you gonna like it .

products.title: Cappuccino
products.description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream add flavorings .
products.description 2: A cappuccino is a classic Italian coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. It is traditionally prepared with equal parts of each element, creating a beverage that is both strong and creamy with a delightful layer of foamy goodness on top.

reviews.author: Amanda Green
reviews.text: Exceptional latte art!

reviews.author: Chris Anderson
reviews.text: Not impressed with the selection of teas.

products.title: Hot Chocolate
products.description: On cold winter days, a cup of hot chocolate makes you feel comfortable and happy. It also makes you feel good because it contains energizing caffeine that use cream add flavorings
products.description 2: Hot chocolate is a warm, comforting beverage made with chocolate, milk, and sweetener. It's typically enjoyed on cold days or as a special treat. Here's a breakdown of its characteristics:

reviews.author: Olivia Taylor
reviews.text: Perfect place to work or study with a cup of coffee.

reviews.author: Daniel Miller
reviews.text: Quality coffee beans make a noticeable difference.

products.title: Ice Latte
products.description: Iced latte is a chilled coffee drink made by mixing espresso and chilled milk. It is served with ice cubes and is also known as cafè latte iced or latte on the rocks.
products.description 2: An iced latte is a refreshing coffee drink perfect for hot weather. It's made with espresso, milk, and ice. The espresso provides a strong coffee flavor, while the milk smooths it out and adds a touch of sweetness. The ice chills the drink down, making it perfect for a hot day.

reviews.author: Sophie Turner
reviews.text: Average experience, nothing extraordinary.

reviews.author: William Davis
reviews.text: Friendly baristas and quick service.

products.title: Iced Coffee
products.description: A coffee with ice, typically served with a dash of milk, cream or sweetener—iced coffee is really as simple as that.The espresso provides a strong coffee flavor with enriched ingredients
products.description 2: Iced coffee is a refreshing beverage made with coffee that is served cold. It's a popular drink, especially during hot weather.

reviews.author: Eva Martinez
reviews.text: Relaxing music and comfortable seating.

reviews.author: Benjamin Adams
reviews.text: I love their specialty coffee blends!

products.title: Frapino Caramel
products.description: It's a blended or rather shaken coffee with whipped cream on top. A must for hot summer days.The espresso provides a strong coffee flavor with enriched delicious ingredients
products.description 2: Frapino Caramel appears to be a coffee-based blended beverage flavored with caramel, likely offered by the coffee shop chain Espresso House.

reviews.author: Sophia Lee
reviews.text: The caramel flavor is heavenly!

reviews.author: David Carter
reviews.text: A bit too sweet for my liking.

products.title: Iced Espresso
products.description: iced espresso can be served with a dash of milk, cream . You can also ice speciality espresso-based drinks like americanos, mochas, macchiatos and lattes
products.description 2: An iced espresso is a refreshing coffee drink made with espresso shots poured over ice. It's a bolder and more concentrated version of iced coffee, with a stronger coffee flavor and a thicker consistency.

reviews.author: Tom Johnson
reviews.text: Not a fan of the bitter taste.

reviews.author: Lily Smith
reviews.text: Refreshing, but could use more sweetness.

products.title: Chocolate Cake
products.description: Indulge in the rich and decadent taste of chocolate with this moist and delightful chocolate cake. It's a bolder, with a stronger coffee flavor and a thicker consistency. you gonna like it .
products.description 2: Chocolate cake is a classic dessert that is loved by people of all ages. Chocolate cake can be enjoyed on its own or served with ice cream, fruit, or whipped cream.

reviews.author: Natalie Miller
reviews.text: Absolutely divine! Best chocolate cake in town.

reviews.author: Jason Brown
reviews.text: Moist and rich, just the way I like it.

products.title: Strawberry Cheesecake
products.description: Enjoy the combination of creamy cheesecake and fresh strawberries. it has a mixed feeling between sour and sweet taste
products.description 2: Strawberry cheesecake is a classic dessert that combines a rich, creamy cheese filling with a sweet and tart strawberry topping on a crumbly graham cracker crust.

reviews.author: Emma Davis
reviews.text: Not as flavorful as expected.

reviews.author: Michael White
reviews.text: The perfect balance of sweetness and creaminess.

products.title: Blueberry Muffins
products.description: Start your day with these delicious and moist blueberry muffins, bursting with juicy blueberries in every bite. you gonna like it so much a delight
products.description 2: Blueberry muffins are a popular breakfast or snack treat. They are typically small, round cakes made with flour, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, and baking powder. They can be enjoyed plain or with a variety of toppings, such as streusel, glaze, or nuts.

reviews.author: Sophie Turner
reviews.text: Perfectly moist and bursting with blueberries!

reviews.author: John Evans
reviews.text: A bit too sweet for my taste.

products.title: Vanilla Ice Cream
products.description: Cool down with the classic and creamy vanilla ice cream. Perfect on its own or as a delightful addition to your favorite desserts. you gonna like it so much
products.description 2: Vanilla ice cream is a classic and widely-loved flavor, often considered the quintessential ice cream experience. Its characteristic taste is sweet and creamy with a subtle, warm, and slightly floral note from the vanilla bean.

reviews.author: Sophia Harris
reviews.text: Creamy and delicious, a perfect treat!

reviews.author: Daniel Wright
reviews.text: Best vanilla ice cream in town!

products.title: fruity pancakes
products.description: delicious pancakes topped with fresh fruits
